strapiPost.title: The More You Know
strapiPost.content:
You might ride a bike every day, but do you know how it works, and the history of its evolution?

  • The latest: The Amazeum is always amazing us with its new fun and science-y exhibits. Developed by the Carnegie Science Center in Pittsburgh, GEAR UP: The Science of Bikes is coming to Bentonville Sept. 24 through Jan. 10. 
  • A deeper look: The exhibit will walk attendees through the “science, technology, engineering, art and math in the world’s most recognizable mode of transportation.” 

Reserve tickets HERE.
